about_the_game:
"RPG Soundtrack Collection - Orchestral Edition" is a great pack of music that includes a total of 29 tracks, covering a wide range of situations, including battles, fields, towns, dungeons, and events!
Each track has both an orchestral and 8-bit version (sold separately) !
Choose the style that best represents your worldview! (Alternatively, both!)
All tracks are about 1 minute in length making them extremely easy to use to adapt into your game!

*This collection is the Orchestral Edition.
*******************************************
Battle tracks: 3 tracks
battle1
battle2
battle3

village, town, etc.: 5 tracks
village
city
snow village
bar
castle

fields, dungeons: 6 tracks
fields
forest
dungeon

sea
snow mountain

Other events etc.:15 tracks

love

suspicious
mysterious
in a pinch
aggressive
festival
comical
happy
worry

Total 29 tracks

*******************************************

*No commercial use outside of Maker Series.
*Rights must be indicated when using the material.
*Modification of some of the materials is permitted for user game use only (redistribution is not permitted).
*The copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
